name: 'Black' and 'White' Movies Quiz | Common Titles | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what 1987 movie would you find Debra Winger as a federal agent?
questions.explanation:
Black Widow.

	Debra Winger stars as the federal agent sworn to bring the 'black widow' killer (played by Theresa Russell) to justice.

questions.text: George Segal plays Sam Spade Jr. in what 1975 movie?
questions.explanation:
The Black Bird.

	Segal portrays the son of the famous detective Sam Spade in this satirical sequel to 'The Maltese Falcon'.

questions.text: In what 1992 movie would you find the character Sheriff Ray Dolezal?
questions.explanation:
White Sands.

	Willem Dafoe starred as Sheriff Dolezal who after he finds a suicide and a suitcase filled with $500,000 he goes on the trail to find out what it is all about.  Mickey Rourke and Samuel L. Jackson also star.

questions.text: In what 1963 movie would you find Boris Karloff as a vampire?
questions.explanation:
Black Sabbath.

	'Black Sabbath' was an anthology of three horror stories.  The most notable one was 'Wurdulak', which was the one with Boris Karloff.

questions.text: Mikhail Baryshnikov and Gregory Hines starred in this 1985 movie.
questions.explanation:
White Nights.

	This drama/thriller also co-starred Isabella Rossellini and Helen Mirren.

questions.text: What 1990 movie was based on the novel about the location shoot for 'The African Queen'?
questions.explanation:
White Hunter, Black Heart.

	Clint Eastwood portrays fictional director John Wilson who was more eager to shoot elephants then shoot a movie.

questions.text: In what 1973 movie would you find a character Gator McKlusky?
questions.explanation:
White Lightning.

	Burt Reynolds stars as Gator McKlusky who after being arrested for moonshining decides to help the police capture a key figure in the moonshining business.

questions.text: What Edgar Allen Poe tale was somewhat adapted to the big screen in 1981?
questions.explanation:
The Black Cat.

	Patrick MaGee stars as the psychic who can record the the voices of the dead on tape. Poe's tale and the movie have very little in common.

questions.text: This 1990 movie paired Susan Sarandon and James Spader as lovers?
questions.explanation:
White Palace.

	Susan Sarandon plays a 43 year old waitress and James Spader a 27 year old advertising executive.  With nothing in common they still manage to fall in love with each other.

questions.text: In what 1979 movie would you find a character Henry Dailey as an elderly horse trainer?
questions.explanation:
The Black Stallion.

	Mickey Rooney starred as the elderly trainer who encourages a young boy to train his horse to become a champion.
